title: Red tape
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community and school
description: Episode of Series "Changes...From the Inside". Devised by Glenn and Les Mack for the Supplementary Grants Program and shows a school community breaking down barriers to encourage community involvement in school decision making. The school draws its pupils from a housing commission estate and the principal's aim is to create a school that responds to the community rather than the conventional process of making the commnity respond to the bureaucratic needs of the school.
related_objects: Series; S01152; Changes...From the Inside; Active; 1984
